channel.title: Test the client
channel.description:
Hey guys i really need someone to see if they can connect to my server. The client link is http://www.mediafire.com/?3gay352b7u9ka77
please post back whether or not you can connect. Thank you

item.title: Test the client
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

If it’s a connection thing, PM me your IP address and port and I’ll do a quick telnet test for you. If it’s testing your client, I’m sorry but that’s considered advertising.

Read full topic
